INSERT INTO
( tid, uid, univalent, quantity, deal_amount, deal_date, type, status, phone, user_name ) VALUES ( #{tid}, #{uid}, #{univalent}, #{quantity}, #{deal_amount}, NOW(), #{type}, #{status}, #{phone}, #{user_name} )
mapper.select: select t1.uid,(IFNULL(t1.buy_release_amount,0)- IFNULL(t2.sell_amount,0)) as tradeableAmount from (select uid,sum(deal_amount) as buy_release_amount from ftc_deal where type in(0,7) and status=6 GROUP BY uid) as t1 left join (select uid,sum(deal_amount) as sell_amount from ftc_deal where type=1 and status=6 GROUP BY uid) as t2 ON t1.uid = t2.uid where t1.uid = #{uid}
SELECT tid,uid,user_name,phone,univalent,quantity,deal_amount,deal_date,status,type from ftc_deal where type = 0 and status = 3
SELECT tid,uid,user_name,phone,univalent,quantity,deal_amount,deal_date,status,type from ftc_deal where type = 1 and status = 3 ORDER BY deal_date
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ftc_order ( oid, deal_buy_id, deal_sell_id, seller_id, buyer_id, seller_phone, seller_name, buyer_phone, buyer_name, order_date, status, univalent, quantity, deal_amount ) VALUES ( #{oid}, #{deal_buy_id}, #{deal_sell_id}, #{seller_id}, #{buyer_id}, #{seller_phone}, #{seller_name}, #{buyer_phone}, #{buyer_name}, NOW(), #{status}, #{univalent}, #{quantity}, #{deal_amount} )
mapper.select: SELECT oid, deal_buy_id, deal_sell_id, seller_id, seller_name, buyer_id, buyer_name, seller_phone, buyer_phone, status, univalent, quantity, deal_amount, pay_way, pay_date, affirm_date, order_date, finish_date, cancle_date, freeze_date from ftc_order where oid = #{oid}
SELECT uid ,tid,oid,deal_amount,deal_date ,status,type,univalent,quantity from ftc_deal where uid = #{id} and type in (0,1,2,7) order by deal_date desc
SELECT uid ,tid,oid,deal_amount,deal_date ,status,type,univalent,quantity from ftc_deal where uid = #{id} and type in (0,1) and status in(3,4,5,8)
SELECT uid ,tid,oid,deal_amount,deal_date ,status,type,univalent,quantity from ftc_deal where uid = #{uid} and status =9 and to_days(deal_date)=to_days(NOW())
SELECT uid ,tid,oid,deal_amount,deal_date ,status,type,univalent,quantity from ftc_deal where uid = #{id} and type =1 and to_days(deal_date)=to_days(NOW())
SELECT count(1) from ftc_deal where uid = #{uid} and status in (3,4,5,8)
